# predict.hair — Hair & Hairstyles Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for hair & hairstyles. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.hair is a prediction market platform focused on hair & hairstyles. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Hair & Hairstyles prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.hair)
- [Markets — Active hair & hairstyles prediction markets](https://predict.hair#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, hair & hairstyles, betting, odds, forecast, predict.hair
